document_data.name: Thaliach Mindogar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Thaliach Mindogar''' was a young [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] in [[Archendale]] in [[1370 DR]].

{{quote|''While the [[Swords of Archendale|Swords]] worry about the rot in the [[Darkwater Brand]], the true weakness at the heart of [[Archendale]] sits at a map table in the inner sanctom of the house of [[Chauntea]] in [[Archenbridge]] and fancies himself a behind-the-scenes world power. 
''|
[[Elminster]], talking about Thaliach}}
document_data.Activities: Thaliach managed the temple of Chauntea in Archendale, the [[Bounty of the Goddess (Archenbridge)|Bounty of the Goddess]]. He used the temple to manage a network of small businesses.
document_data.Personality: Thaliach was a young, energetic, and ambitious priest who wanted to restore the faith of Chauntea in the dale to show his abilities. He had the idea of creating a business to impress the mercantile inhabitants of the dale. Thaliach was rather a sickly and slim fanatic. He liked collecting maps.
